experience.title: Application and Business Development Engineer
highlights: Develop automation, robotics, and machine vision solutions for industrial applications.
Understand customer requirements and design customized technical solutions.
Drive business expansion through strategic planning and client engagement.

projects.name: Color Code Inspection System
projects.description: Developed an automated VisionMaster-based solution system for real-time color code inspection in production lines. Designed and implemented image acquisition, processing, and analysis to ensure accurate identification of color-coded labels. Optimized color segmentation and edge detection to enhance accuracy and minimize errors, improving overall quality control.

projects.name: Dimensional Inspection System
projects.description: Designed an automated VisionMaster-based solution system for precision dimensional inspection of manufactured components. Integrated machine vision algorithms for edge detection, feature extraction, and tolerance verification to measure critical dimensions (ID, OD, groove length, and height). Optimized workflows to enhance inspection speed, accuracy, and industrial quality control.
